Element.name: HybridModuleDefinition
Element.Description: An Hybrid Module Definition is a collection of reusable interaction flow model, including view containers and actions.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: Defines the page which contributes to the content of the page where the Module has been placed. It can be only one per hybrid module.

PropertyCategory.name: Layout
PropertyCategory.Property: If checked the layout of this module is generated once ignoring where the module referencing it are placed. Note that single layout feature is available only if the module is an hybrid module without a content page.

PropertyCategory.name: Appearance
PropertyCategory.Property: A distinctive icon displayed by all the module referencing this component.
